duties_responsibilities.duty: Resolve tech-related customer issues and thoroughly document customer service requests.
Collaborate with IT groups to implement effective solutions to meet customer needs.
Assist customers on an ongoing basis, develop long-term strategies for efficient IT service use.
Analyze documented incidents for trends and update associated documentation as needed.
Be available for immediate response to urgent customer needs and may be required to be on-call/standby for after-hours and weekend emergencies.
Lift at least 50 pounds when required.

education_certification.credential: High School/GED and four years of related experience. Post-secondary education can be substituted in lieu of experience. OK Driver's License required
Bachelor's degree in IT or Communication (Preferred)
